cast.original_title: Teen Titans Go! To the Movies
cast.overview: All the major DC superheroes are starring in their own films, all but the Teen Titans, so Robin is determined to remedy this situation by getting over his role as a sidekick and becoming a movie star. Thus, with a few madcap ideas and an inspirational song in their hearts, the Teen Titans head to Hollywood to fulfill their dreams.
cast.title: Teen Titans Go! To the Movies

details.biography: Dave Stone was born on March 25, 1982 in Goffstown, New Hampshire, USA as David J Stone. He is known for his work on Teen Titans Go! (2013), Star vs. the Forces of Evil (2015) and Breadwinners (2014).
details.name: Dave Stone
